Attack: greatclub +3 melee (1d10+1) or bite +3 melee (1d4+1) or slam +3 melee (1d6+1) or javelin +0 ranged (1d6+1)
Full Attack: greatclub +3 melee (1d10+1) or bite +3 melee (1d4+1) or slam +3 melee (1d6+1) or javelin +0 ranged (1d6+1)
Special Qualities: Single actions only, damage reduction 5/slashing, darkvision 60 ft., undead traits
Abilities: Str 12, Dex 7, Con —, Int —, Wis 10, Cha 1

Descripci\u00f3n: Zombies are corpses reanimated through dark and sinister magic.Because of their utter lack of intelligence, the instructions given to a newly created zombie must be very simple.
